Class com.tektools.kawa.plugin.KawaClassLoader 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----java.lang.ClassLoader
           |
           +----com.tektools.kawa.plugin.KawaClassLoader
public class KawaClassLoader
extends ClassLoader
Classloader used by Kawa to implement the plugin architecture. This classloader compares class file dates to load the newest version of a class. During the plugin development it is important to load the latest version of the class without having to restart Kawa each time. This classloader enables Kawa to accomplish the same. Kawa automatically uses this classloader to load all plugin classes that are found in the plugin classpath defined with the plugin command. Therefore, it is important not to add JDK jar and zip files in plugin command classpath as KawaClassloader will try and load these classes also and the plugin command can be very slow.
